titles.title: Veterans Education Improvement Act of 2017
Veterans Education Improvement Act of 2017

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the use of Post-9/11 Educational Assistance to pursue independent study programs at certain educational institutions that are not institutions of higher learning, and for other purposes.
Veterans Education Improvement Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Veterans Education Improvement Act of 2017
This bill permits veterans to use Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Post-9/11 educational assistance for an accredited independent study program offered by an educational institution that is not an institution of higher learning, such as an area career and technical education school or a postsecondary vocational institution providing postsecondary level education.
